content.description:
Iam summas arces TritoniaTritonius, -a, -um, adj.: Tritonian (a description of Minerva), respice, PallasPallas, -adis, f.: the goddess Minerva 
inseditinsideo, -ere, -sedi = sedeo, -ere nimbonimbus, -i, m. = nubes, -is effulgenseffulgeo, -ere: to shine et GorgoneGorgo, -onis, f.: Gorgon saeva.
content.question: In the sentence, what does arces mean?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2

skill.text: 1.A: Identify the meaning of Latin words and phrases.
